742.title: they can remove your account after complaints

tosdr.case: The service can suspend your account for several reasons
tosdr.tldr:
If we get 
abuse information concerning any files hosted on OwnCube, we will 
inform the corresponding user about it and give him/her the 
opportunity to remove the relevant data IMMEDIATELY. If the files are 
not removed within ONE day, we claim the right to remove the user's 
account.

932.title: Terms may be changed any time at their discretion, without notice to the user

tosdr.case: Terms may be changed any time at their discretion, without notice to the user
tosdr.tldr: They can change the terms of service any time they see fit, even without notification to the user. Your use of the service supposedly constitutes acceptance of the changes in the terms.

tosdr.case: This service does not sell your personal data
tosdr.tldr:
We do not sell, trade, or rent 
Users personal identification information to others.
